切り崩す: (きりくずす) - to level (earth)/to cut through (a mountain); to split (the opposition)/to break (strike)
切り幣: (きりぬさ) - paper and sacred sakaki branches cut and mixed with rice to scatter before the gods
切り干し大根: (きりぼしだいこん) - thinly sliced and dried strips of daikon
切り張り: (きりばり) - patching (up)/cutting a part and pasting a new one (e.g. a shoji door); cut and paste
切り得: (きりどく) - no retribution for a samurai killing a commoner
切り戸口: (きりどぐち) - small wooden door at the rear of a noh stage; small garden gate
切り戻す: (きりもどす) - switch-back (reversal of redundancy switching following repair)
切り払う: (きりはらう) - to clear away; to clear land; to prune; to lop off
切り抜き: (きりぬき) - clipping (of newspaper article, etc.)/cutting/scrap (for a scrapbook); cut-out (picture, coloured paper, etc.)
切り抜き人形: (きりぬきにんぎょう) - cutout (paper) doll
切り抜き細工: (きりぬきざいく) - cutouts (of coloured paper)
切り抜く: (きりぬく) - to cut out; to clip from; to extract
切り抜ける: (きりぬける) - to cut one's way through; to tide over; to struggle through; to get over
切り拓く: (きりひらく) - to clear (land); to open up; to cut through
切り拡げる: (きりひろげる) - to cut and enlarge
切り捨て: (kirisute) - cutting a person down (without a second thought), sacrificing, throwing to the wolves, treating as sword fodder; omission, rounding down (por exemplo, frações), truncation
切り捨てられる: (きりすてられる) - can be discarded; can be cut down
切り捨てる: (きりすてる) - to cut down/to slay; to truncate/to round down/to round off; to omit/to discard/to cast away
切り捨て御免: (きりすてごめん) - right of samurai to kill commoners for perceived affronts (Edo period)
切り据える: (きりすえる) - to cut down an enemy
切り捲る: (きりまくる) - to attack and scatter; to argue vehemently
切り掛かる: (きりかかる) - to assault with a sword; to stab at; to slash at
切り掛る: (きりかかる) - to assault with a sword; to stab at; to slash at
切り接ぎ: (きりつぎ) - cutting and patching/splicing; (esp. 切り接ぎ, 切接ぎ) grafting
切り揃える: (きりそろえる) - to cut and even up; to cut several pieces to the same size
切り換え: (きりかえ) - exchange; conversion; replacement; switching (to); switchover
切り換える: (きりかえる) - to change; to exchange; to convert; to renew; to throw a switch; to replace; to switch over
切り換え時: (きりかえどき) - time to switch over; response time
切り放す: (きりはなす) - to detach; to decapitate; to cut loose; to let loose; to dismember
切り放つ: (きりはなつ) - to cut loose/to let loose/to cut off/to detach/to dismember/to cut in two; to separate in thought/to consider as independent
切り散らす: (きりちらす) - to cut down all; to slash promiscuously
切り整える: (きりととのえる) - to cut and prepare (stones)
切り方: (きりかた) - way of cutting; how to cut or slice
切り暖簾: (きりのれん) - short split entrance curtain
切り替える: (きりかえる) - to change; to exchange; to convert; to renew; to throw a switch; to replace; to switch over
切り替え時: (きりかえどき) - time to switch over; response time
切り替わる: (きりかわる) - to change completely; to switch (to); to shift (to another mode)
切り枯らす: (きりからす) - to destroy; to kill off (trees)
切り死に: (きりじに) - fighting to the death (with swords)
切り殺す: (きりころす) - to slay; to put somebody to the sword
切り火: (きりび) - striking sparks with flint and steel or by rubbing sticks together (usu. to start a fire)/fire lit by sparks from flint and steel, etc.; {Shinto} Shinto fire-purification ceremony
切り狂言: (きりきょうげん) - last piece in a kabuki programme
切り畑: (きりはた) - hillside farm; fallow ground
切り番: (きりばん) - good turning point number (10000, 12345 etc., often referring to web site visit counts)
切り盛り: (きりもり) - management/administration; cutting up and serving food
切り直す: (きりなおす) - to correct cutting; to reshuffle (playing cards)
切り石: (きりいし) - hewn stone; quarried stone; ashlar; flagstone
切り破る: (きりやぶる) - to cut to pieces
切り窓: (きりまど) - windows cut out of a wall
切り立て: (きりたて) - freshly cut; freshly tailored; tree cut to specified length, especially for corners of a kemari court
切り立てる: (きりたてる) - to cut; to slash; to slay all
切り端: (きりはし) - scraps; cut end; cut-off piece
切り粉: (きりこ) - chips or shavings left after cutting wood or metal with a saw, etc.
切り紙: (きりがみ) - cut paper; paper cut in half; paper scrap; the art of cutting paper (in contrast to origami)
切り紙絵: (きりかみえ) - cutout; cutout picture; collage
切り細裂く: (きりこまざく) - to cut up small
切り組む: (きりくむ) - to piece together; to mortise; to miter; to dovetail
切り結ぶ: (きりむすぶ) - to cross swords with
切り継ぎ: (きりつぎ) - cutting and patching/splicing; (esp. 切り接ぎ, 切接ぎ) grafting
切り縄: (きりなわ) - piece of rope cut for a certain purpose
切り羽: (きりは) - face (of a wall of coal or ore, etc.); working face (of a mine)
切り苛む: (きりさいなむ) - to cut to pieces; to torment
切り落し: (きりおとし) - leftover pieces (when slicing meat, fish, cake, etc.)/end pieces; clipping
切り落す: (きりおとす) - to cut off; to lop off; to prune
切り落とし: (きりおとし) - leftover pieces (when slicing meat, fish, cake, etc.)/end pieces; clipping
切り落とす: (きりおとす) - to cut off; to lop off; to prune
切り裂きジャック: (きりさきジャック) - Jack the Ripper
切り裂く: (きりさく) - to cut off; to cut up; to tear to pieces
切り解く: (きりほどく) - to cut open a tied bundle; releasing prisoners
切り詰める: (きりつめる) - to shorten/to cut short/to trim; to cut down on/to reduce/to economize/to economise
切り貼り: (kiribari) - patching (up), cutting a part and pasting a new one (ex. uma porta shoji); cut and paste
切り起こす: (きりおこす) - to open up waste land for cultivation
